name: Novel Alchemy
description:
Novel Alchemy is an Action Platformer where you must counter the elements of your enemies! You can use pure, weak elements at range or combine them to deal higher damage at closer range, but only against an opposite type! You play as a scientist reclaiming his lab from an experiment which has gone wrong, causing the elemental beasts to appear and take control of the lab. Use your combat timing as well as quick reaction skills to switch elements on the fly and avoid damage, while taking out your enemies! This game was made in 7 days for the 5th Brackey's Game Jam. The Theme for this jam was 'Stronger Together'. Controls:
  • Arrow/ AD keys to move
  • QWE for element combinations
  • Space/ Up arrow to jump
  • Escape to Pause
  • X to attack
  • Defeat all enemies to advance to the next stage!
